Client.Name: Guangdong Zongheng Dapeng Innovation Technology Co., Ltd

Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Guangdong Zongheng Dapeng Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. was established on October 18, 2021, with its registered address at No. 312, 313, and 319, 3rd floor, 181 Park, VLAB, No. 181, 183, and 185 Shatai South Road, Baiyun District, Guangzhou. The legal representative is Wang Shuxian. The business scope includes intelligent control system integration; Information system integration services; Manufacturing of intelligent unmanned aerial vehicles; Sales of intelligent unmanned aerial vehicles; Manufacturing of industrial automatic control system devices; Data processing and storage support services; Aviation operations support services; Aviation business services; Sales of air transportation equipment; Sales of electronic products; Development of artificial intelligence application software; Software development; Technical services, development, consultation, exchange, transfer, and promotion; Engineering technical services (excluding planning management, survey, design, and supervision);; Production of civil aircraft (engines, propellers); Civil aircraft maintenance; Civil aviation maintenance technology training; Civil aircraft pilot training; Manufacturing of civil aircraft components; General aviation services; Flight training; Guangdong Zongheng Dapeng Innovation Technology Co., Ltd. invested in one company externally
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Teaching videos, demonstration videos, and some video files captured by drones developed by the company
